import React from 'react'; import { ListGroup, ListGroupItem, ListGroupItemHeading, ListGroupItemText } from 'reactstrap'; const Questions = () => { return ( What do I need to play? Chrome, Metamask (on the Rinkeby Network) and one account with a minimum of 0.01 Ether exc. Fees
Where is the source code? The Lottery DApp source code can be found here under 'Contract'
Who has entered the Lottery? Everyone who has entered the Lottery can be found here under 'Transactions'
How is the winner selected? The winner is selected based on a random number generated from Smart Contract code. How is the winner selected? The winner is selected based on a random number generated from Smart Contract code. ); } export default Questions;
